name: Easy poker
description:
It's like poker but is easier!

Draw five cards and roll the die to choose how many cards to change.
It's easy try it!

Get to 100 coins with as few bets as possible! Card value / Scoring

During game you can check the value of the cards at the bottom left, from highest to lowest.

How to play
  • Draw 5 cards.
  • Roll the die.
    Click the die to stop it.
  • Pay to influence the value of the die.
    One coin to re-roll or one coin to increase / decrease its value.
  • Change cards based on the value of the die.
    Select the cards to change but remember, the number of the selected cards must be equal to the value of the die.
  • If you're confident your hand is best, bet more coins!

Sorry for the lack of sounds. There is a button in the top left to mute, so you don't have to hear bad stuff. :(
